name: Annual Financial Planning Review
description: Standard annual review process for existing clients to assess changes, review performance, and make necessary adjustments.

stages.name: Review Preparation
stages.description: Gather information and prepare for the annual review meeting

tasks.title: Monitor Upcoming Reviews
tasks.description: Track clients due for annual review

tasks.title: Arrange Review Meeting
tasks.description: Contact client to schedule annual review meeting

tasks.title: Meeting Preparation
tasks.description: Complete preparation tasks in reasonable time before meeting

tasks.title: Create Plan Summary
tasks.description: Summary of all plans under management with valuations and performance

tasks.title: Gather Performance Information
tasks.description: Collect performance data for all client investments

tasks.title: Update Cashflow Model
tasks.description: Refresh cashflow projections and show progress towards objectives

tasks.title: Share Preparation Pack
tasks.description: Share review pack with adviser ahead of meeting

stages.name: Review Meeting
stages.description: Conduct the annual review meeting with the client

tasks.title: Discuss Cash Position
tasks.description: Review any updates on client's cash position

tasks.title: Review Circumstance Changes
tasks.description: Discuss any changes in client's circumstances

tasks.title: Review Plans Under Management
tasks.description: Discuss performance and status of all managed plans

tasks.title: Review Attitude to Risk
tasks.description: Reassess client's attitude to risk and capacity for loss

tasks.title: Review Cashflow Modelling
tasks.description: Discuss updated cashflow projections and progress

tasks.title: Track Progress Against Goals
tasks.description: Review progress towards financial objectives

tasks.title: Record Meeting Actions
tasks.description: Document any actions or decisions from the meeting

stages.name: Post-Meeting Analysis
stages.description: Analyze meeting outcomes and prepare recommendations

tasks.title: Review Meeting Notes
tasks.description: Analyze meeting notes and identify required actions

tasks.title: Create Review Report
tasks.description: Report covering each existing plan and recommendations

tasks.title: Protection Review
tasks.description: Review protection needs and identify appropriate solutions

tasks.title: Pension & Investment Review
tasks.description: Review pensions and investments, generate illustrations where needed

tasks.title: Send Report for Review
tasks.description: Send report to adviser for review and approval

tasks.title: Case Checking
tasks.description: Send case for checking where needed and complete remedial work

stages.name: Present Recommendations
stages.description: Present any recommendations to the client and obtain agreement

tasks.title: Arrange Recommendation Meeting
tasks.description: Schedule meeting to discuss any recommendations

tasks.title: Discuss Suitability Report
tasks.description: Present recommendations and ensure client understanding

tasks.title: Allow Client Time to Digest
tasks.description: Give client time to consider recommendations after the call

tasks.title: Respond to Follow-up Questions
tasks.description: Address any questions the client may have

tasks.title: Confirm Client Decision
tasks.description: Follow up to confirm if client wants to proceed

tasks.title: Request Signed Suitability Report
tasks.description: Obtain client signature on final suitability report

stages.name: Implement Changes
stages.description: Execute any agreed changes and update client records

tasks.title: Research Implementation Process
tasks.description: Research process to complete recommendations via providers

tasks.title: Execute Recommendations
tasks.description: Implement the recommendations made in suitability report

tasks.title: Record Existing Plan Analysis
tasks.description: Document analysis of existing plans and recommendations

tasks.title: Monitor Change Progress
tasks.description: Create tasks to monitor progress of any changes

tasks.title: Update Plan Records
tasks.description: Update plan records with new information and fees

tasks.title: Provide Client Update
tasks.description: Give client comprehensive update of all changes

tasks.title: Schedule Next Review
tasks.description: Set task to remind of next review for ongoing clients
